# UISearchTextFieldPasteItem

**Protocol**

A protocol that supports pasting tokens.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UISearchTextFieldPasteItem : UITextPasteItem
```

## Overview

When implementing [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteDelegate/textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_:transform:)], your [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteDelegate] can decide whether to paste the item as text or as a token. If the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem] it receives is a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldPasteItem], you can call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldPasteItem/setSearchTokenResult(_:)] to prepare a token for pasting instead of text.

## Providing a token

- **setSearchTokenResult(_:)**: Sets a paste item’s search token from an item provider.

## Pasteboard support

- **UITextPasteItem**: The interface for obtaining information about, and interacting with, a text item for pasting or dropping.
- **UITextPasteDelegate**: The interface for handling pasting and dropping of text, using item providers.
- **UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting**: The interface for text-oriented responder objects to participate in the unified paste and drop system in iOS.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- UITextPasteItem
